Package com.deco2800.game.components

Class PlayerBuffs

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.PlayerBuffs
public abstract class PlayerBuffs
extends java.lang.Object
Class which handles the behaviour of the different buffs and debuffs available to a player. Methods of this class are called when the player collides with the corresponding buff or debuff. Methods of this class also handle removing the effects of time-based buffs. This class allows for easy extension and alteration of existing buffs and debuffs.

    • removeTimedBuff

      public static void removeTimedBuff​(BuffInformation buffInfo, Entity player)
      Handler method for determining which buff to remove, depending on the buffs type. The appropriate de/buff-removal function is called to remove the de/buff effects from the player. This method must be updated if a new timed buff is created.
      Parameters:
      buffInfo - information about the buff being removed from the player
      player - the player from which this buff's effects are being removed
